channel.title: Getting Ready To Go on RIDDL Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Ready To Go on RIDDL Documentation

item.title: IntelliJ Plugin
item.author: reid@reactific.com (Reid Spencer)
item.description: This project has not started yet but has a high priority attached to it. Like other languages, RIDDL will have an IntelliJ Plugin to do syntax highlighting and error checking to help the author write the language effectively.

item.title: VSCode Plugin
item.author: reid@reactific.com (Reid Spencer)
item.description: This project has not started yet but has a high priority attached to it. Like other languages, RIDDL will have a Visual Studio Code plugin to do syntax highlighting and error checking to help authors write the language effectively.
